query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		solutioninstanceconnection {
			edges {
				node {
					_id,
					created,
					description,
					edit_url,
					enabled,
					id,
					linkable,
					name,
					solution {
						_id,
						custom_fields,
						description,
						id,
						name,
						test_button_enabled,
						title,
						url,
					},
					url,
				},
			},
			nodes {
				_id,
				created,
				description,
				edit_url,
				enabled,
				id,
				linkable,
				name,
				solution {
					_id,
					custom_fields,
					description,
					id,
					name,
					test_button_enabled,
					title,
					url,
				},
				url,
			},
			total_count,
		}
	}
